/*CommonHelpMapper.HELP_CUSTOMER*/ SELECT A.CUSTOMER_CD AS "CUSTOMER_CD" , A.CUSTOMER_NM AS "CUSTOMER_NM" , A.LICENSE_KEY AS "LICENSE_KEY" , A.COMPANY_NO AS "COMPANY_NO" , A.CUSTOMER_MANAGER AS "CUSTOMER_MANAGER" , A.HP_NO AS "HP_NO" , A.TEL_NO AS "TEL_NO" , A.POST_NO AS "POST_NO" , A.CUSTOMER_ADDRESS1 AS "CUSTOMER_ADDRESS1" , A.CUSTOMER_ADDRESS2 AS "CUSTOMER_ADDRESS2" , A.CUSTOMER_EMAIL AS "CUSTOMER_EMAIL" , A.PROGRESS_YN AS "PROGRESS_YN" , A.ISSUE AS "ISSUE" FROM ES_CUSTOMER_M A WHERE 1 = 1
AND ( A.CUSTOMER_CD LIKE '%' || #{KEYWORD} || '%' OR A.CUSTOMER_NM LIKE '%' || #{KEYWORD} || '%' )

/*CommonHelpMapper.HELP_USER*/ SELECT A.COMPANY_CD AS "COMPANY_CD" , A.USER_ID AS "USER_ID" , A.USER_NM AS "USER_NM" , A.USE_YN AS "USE_YN" FROM ES_USER A WHERE A.COMPANY_CD = #{COMPANY_CD} AND A.USER_NM LIKE '%'|| #{KEYWORD} ||'%' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY A.INSERT_DTS DESC
/*CommonHelpMapper.HELP_AUTHGROUP*/ SELECT GROUP_CD , GROUP_NM FROM ES_GROUP_M WHERE 1=1 AND COMPANY_CD = #{COMPANY_CD} AND GROUP_CD != 'WEB00' ORDER BY GROUP_CD

/*CommonHelpMapper.HELP_BANK*/ SELECT A.COMPANY_CD AS "COMPANY_CD" , A.SYSDEF_CD AS "BANK_CD" , A.SYSDEF_NM AS "BANK_NM" FROM ES_CODEDTL A WHERE A.COMPANY_CD = #{COMPANY_CD} AND FIELD_CD = 'ES_Q0009'
AND ( A.SYSDEF_CD LIKE '%' || #{KEYWORD} || '%' OR A.SYSDEF_NM LIKE '%' || #{KEYWORD} || '%' )

/*CommonHelpMapper.HELP_BIZAREA*/ SELECT BIZAREA_CD AS "BIZAREA_CD" , BIZAREA_NM AS "BIZAREA_NM" , BIZAREA_NO AS "BIZAREA_NO" FROM ES_BIZAREA A WHERE 1=1 AND A.COMPANY_CD = #{COMPANY_CD}
AND ( A.BIZAREA_CD LIKE '%'|| #{KEYWORD} ||'%' OR A.BIZAREA_NM LIKE '%'|| #{KEYWORD} ||'%' OR A.BIZAREA_NO LIKE '%'|| #{KEYWORD} ||'%' )

/*CommonHelpMapper.HELP_BLURB*/ SELECT A.COMPANY_CD AS "COMPANY_CD" , A.ADV_CD AS "ADV_CD" , A.ADV_NM AS "ADV_NM" , A.AM AS "AM" , A.ADV_MONTH AS "ADV_MONTH" , A.BOX_YN AS "BOX_YN" , A.BOX_NUM AS "BOX_NUM" , A.INSERT_ID AS "INSERT_ID" , A.INSERT_DTS AS "INSERT_DTS" , A.UPDATE_ID AS "UPDATE_ID" , A.UPDATE_DTS AS "UPDATE_DTS" FROM ES_BLURB_MASTER A WHERE A.COMPANY_CD = #{COMPANY_CD}
AND ( A.ADV_CD LIKE '%' || #{KEYWORD} || '%' OR A.ADV_NM LIKE '%' || #{KEYWORD} || '%' )

/*CommonHelpMapper.HELP_CATEGORY*/ SELECT A.COMPANY_CD AS "COMPANY_CD" , A.CATEGORY_CD AS "CATEGORY_CD" , A.CATEGORY_NM AS "CATEGORY_NM" , A.PARENT_CD AS "PARENT_CD" FROM ES_CATEGORY A WHERE 1=1 AND A.COMPANY_CD = #{COMPANY_CD} AND A.PARENT_CD = #{PARENT_CD} AND A.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND ( A.CATEGORY_CD LIKE '%' || #{KEYWORD} || '%' OR A.CATEGORY_NM LIKE '%' || #{KEYWORD} || '%' )
